Soon, her Father's palace was in sight, glimmering gold and glowing on the horizon. Ariel had forgotten just how amazing it looked, and was looking forward to spending a few days there. They swam towards the palace, passing by many other mer-people, some of whom seemed to recognise and gawk at Ariel. Ariel wasn't sure whether they were shocked she had put on some weight, or if they were just surprised to see her - either way, she tried to ignore them.

As they headed inside the palace, Ariel spotted her Father, King Triton, waiting for her, overjoyed to see him again, Ariel swam forward as quick as she could and embraced him. King Triton smiled and laughed.

"My dear, it is so good to see you, I am glad you could come!" The King said warmly.

"I wouldn't have missed this for the world father!" Ariel replied.

"It looks as though you've been enjoying your human life though hmm?" Triton laughed warmly.

Ariel guessed he was referring to her larger body, and went a little red. "So, when's the birthday feast?" She asked, trying to change the subject quickly.

"Later this evening, I'm a little busy at the moment, but I'm sure there's something around here to do in the meantime!"
12112112211122211121.title: Arriving at Triton's Kingdom

choices: Somebody comes in and finds Ariel...
Ariel makes it back to her room...
121121122111222111212.content:
Ariel's father had was wrong, there was absolutely nothing to do in the meantime. Her old friend Flounder was away, and wouldn't be here for the feast, and her father, sisters and Sebastian were all too busy preparing for the feast to spend any time with her. Her boredom was made even worse by the consistent rumbling of her stomach - she had not eaten a thing all day, and was desperately craving some human food. As she thought about delicious chocolate cakes, whipped cream and all of the other sweet deliacies she would have been enjoying on land, Ariel decided she would fix herself a snack before the feast. There was only so long she could go without food these days...

Swimming through the busy halls of her old home, Ariel spotted the occasional group of Merfolk staring at her. They seemed to be staring, quite blatantly, at her bulging midsection. A little while ago, Ariel might have been hugely embarassed by this, but she had grown so used to her growing body now that she wasn't even blushing.

As she neared the end of one rocky grotto-like corridor, Ariel found herself at the doors to the great hall, where the feast was due to take place later. She guessed this would be as good a place as any to locate some food, perhaps one of the chefs could whip her up a snack?

Ariel pushed open the doors and swam on ahead, only to find the room totally empty, with the table already laid full of food. Ariel gently closed the doors behind her, and looked around the room to make sure it was empty. Although she had her worries that digging into this fully prepared feast would be bad manners...she couldn't resist tucking in and getting herself a little snack.

Ariel swam forward, and eyed up the array of food on the table - it was all Merfood, various different types of seaweed served in exotic ways. Ariel would have killed for some human food at this banquet, and for a moment she amused herself with the thought of a cake floating around in the water next to her. Although she didn't find this stuff nearly as appetizing as she used to, she was still dying to eat something, so decided to tuck in to a nearby platter of red seaweed.

It wasn't quite as tasteless as Ariel had expected, in fact, she was beginning to remember why she used to enjoy eating this kind of food. She began to devour more and more of the platter, which was beginning to look rather empty after a while...but Ariel wasn't feeling full in the least, human food felt so filling and satisfying, and always left her feeling content after a meal - but this seaweed, while tasty, was doing very little to satisfy her hunger.
As she continued to eat from the platter before her, Ariel looked down and noticed that the once full plate was nearly empty. She was able to grab the last piece of red weed before all she could see was her reflection in the shiny metal. Ariel gasped, she had no idea she was eating so much - she had only come in here for a snack, and had ended up devouring an entire platter...and she still wasn't feeling full!

Her stomach gave a low rumble, and she glanced around the room, fearing someone might enter at any moment and see what she had done. But it seemed she was all alone for the time being, so perhaps she could eat a little more...

Ariel grabbed at another plate, filled with a purple seaweed, and began to grab handfuls of it and cram it into her mouth. She was so hungry, she didn't really care about her manners anymore, and the quicker she ate, the quicker she would be full and be able to get out of here. But Ariel wasn't getting full, and soon she had eaten another platter of seafood, and moved onto the next.

All her inhibitions seemed to melt away under the rumbling of her stomach, and Ariel only began to care about one thing - satisfying her hunger. She continued to swim to different positions around the table, picking at food and shovelling it into her mouth. Realising she needed a breather, Ariel finally stopped eating and lent against the table, breathing heavily as she stared down at her stomach.

Her belly was looking extremely bloated, and Ariel was shocked at how big it had become...had she really eaten that much? She didn't even feel full yet, but her stomach was as big and bloated as it normally was after a three course meal on land. She rubbed her hands over her bloated belly and sighed sadly.

"Why can't I get full?" She groaned, rubbing her hard, firm belly, which was stuffed with food.

Suddenly, Ariel spotted the table...looking rather empty...she appeared to have eaten nearly half the food that had been laid out. She covered her mouth in shock and stared around at the empty platters, that had once been piled high with food.

"Did I really eat all that?" She asked herself. "I have to get out of here before someone finds me..."

Ariel swam for the door...
121121122111222111212.title: Snack turned Feast

choices: Ariel overdoes it once again, and ends up embarassing herself...
1211211221112221112121.content:
Holding her overstuffed belly in one hand, Ariel swam slowly towards the door, feeling a little weighed down by the vast quantities of food she had eaten. As she reached for the door, it suddenly swung open, and Ariel gasped in shock as she saw Aquatta standing in the doorway.

"Ariel? What are you-," Aquatta started to say, but her eyes quickly fell to Ariel's bulging belly.

Ariel was blushing red with embarrassment, knowing that she was going to be found out at any moment. She tried to suck in her bloated stomach, but she simply did not have the ability anymore.

Aquatta was trying to see past Ariel, while Ariel looked down at the floor in shame. Her slim friend swam past her, and stared in shock at the empty plates scattered across the table.

"Ariel..." Aquatta said in shock. "Did you...eat all this?"

Ariel swam up to Aquatta, her face still red with embarrassment, her belly jutting out in front of her. "I'm sorry, I'm so sorry!" Ariel said desperately. "It's just, being a human now, and coming back down here...the food is so different, I couldn't get full...and I just lost control of myself, before I knew it I'd eaten everything in the room!"

Tears fell from Ariel's eyes, and Aquatta placed a comforting hand on her friend's shoulder. "There there Ariel," she said. "It's not your fault, I'm sure you're father will understand!"

"Everyone will think I'm such a greedy pig!" Ariel sobbed.

"Well, I'm sure we can think of something to save you from the embarrassment, after all, this was only the first course...we'll just skip it!"

Ariel wiped her eyes, suddenly feeling better. "Just the first course? Do you think Daddy will mind?"

Aquatta shook her head. "He isn't even involved in this part of the celebration, I'll just talk to Sebastian and we'll pretend this course never existed, it'll be okay."

Ariel smiled, and hugged her friend, her larger body squeezed against Aquatta's, who flinched slightly, looking as though she was being squeezed a bit too much. Ariel let go of her, and giggled slightly. Aquatta smiled and swam away, and Ariel decided it would be best to avoid temptation and return to her room.

---

Later that day, the feast was about to begin, Ariel's sisters and friends were all gathered around the table in the great hall. Ariel, not wanting to draw attention to herself, had arrived at the feast early and taken her seat. Her stomach, which had been extremely bloated, had now shrunk down in size, although she was still feeling a little stuffed after her gorging earlier.

King Triton entered the room with Sebastian, who had prepared a musical number in honour of the King's birthday, as well as dancers and various other celebrations. After everyone wished the King a happy birthday, they sat down to eat...
1211211221112221112121.title: Embarassment

As the feast began, Ariel was only placing tiny amounts of food on her plate - she didn't want to end up eating everything on the table before anyone else had a chance. She could see her sisters, still very slim, and about half her current size, eating smaller amounts than she was having now.

How can they be satisfied with such tiny portions? Ariel thought. Oh forget it, I'm just going to eat what I want!

Ariel reached for another bowl and began to pile more food onto her plate. Aquatta, who was sitting besides her, gave Ariel a worried look. "Ariel, don't overdo it..." Aquatta whispered.

Ariel took a large bite and gulped down a satisfying amount of food. "Mmm...what? Oh, no I won't..."

Aquatta looked worried, as Ariel began to pile more and more onto her plate. As the food earlier had only been a starter, this main course was a lot more filling, and Ariel was enjoying it a lot more. She suddenly began to realise why she used to enjoy eating food like this, and before she knew it, she was on her third helping.

Ariel was oblivious to the fact that her sisters had begun to pick up on her eating habits - some of them were staring at her as she hungrily gobbled up everything on her plate. Some of them began to exchange snide comments.

"Living on the surface certainly seems to have increased your appetite..." One of them said.

"I'll say...a Princess of the Sea would never let herself go like that!"

Ariel looked up from her plate and glared across the table at her sisters. "At least I've been lucky enough to fall in love with a man who doesn't just care about appearances," she said.

Her sisters looked away and carried one eating.

"That shut them up," Aquatta smirked. "Ignore them Ariel, they were always jealous of you."

Ariel smiled and carried on eating, but she had to admit that her sisters comments had gotten to her a little. She absent mindedly began to put more food onto her plate, gobbling it down quickly and trying to forget about what her sisters had said. She felt good about her body, and Eric loved it, being thin was overrated anyway.

Suddenly, a loud belch escaped Ariel's mouth. It even shocked her, and she raised her hand to cover her mouth, "Oh, excuse me!" She said.

Some of her sisters exchanged disgusted looks, Aquatta looked awkward, and King Triton simply laughed. Ariel felt a little embarrassed, clearly she was getting a little gassy...she wanted to avoid any looks she was getting, so began eating again, shovelling more and more onto her plate and clearing many of the bowls in front of her.

Without warning, another belch escaped Ariel's mouth, but this time, she didn't bother excusing herself, in fact, she barely noticed, she was becoming fixated on filling her bulging belly.

"Ariel..." Aquatta whispered. "Aren't you full yet? You've cleared this part of the table..."

"I...I have?" Startled, Ariel looked up and saw that what Aquatta had said was true, she had eaten far more than she had intended to. "Oops...well, I'm pretty full now anyway..."

"Good, it's time for dessert now anyway," Aquatta said.

"Dessert?" Ariel was hoping there would be another course, as she wasn't quite full up yet.

As the servants cleared away the table and brought in the rich looking dessert, Ariel absent mindedly rubbed her pot belly, craving the dessert. A large bowl full of dessert was placed in front of Ariel, and she quickly dug in, shovelling food into her mouth from the bowl with the spoon, getting bits of food around her mouth in her hurry to satisfy her ravenous appetite. Within a matter of moments, she had finished, and finally felt satisfied. While everyone else was still eating, she lay back and rubbed her large, bloated belly. She released another loud belch, and wiped the mess from around her mouth.

She groaned slightly in pleasure as she caressed her full stomach. That had been a good feast.

---

When the servants had cleared away the food, and the guests of the party had all made they're way to bed, Ariel and Aquatta sat talking in the empty hall. Ariel was still feeling stuffed to bursting, and had been rubbing her belly since dinner ended.

"So, what are you going to do now?" Aquatta asked.

"I'm going home to Eric," Ariel said. "He worries about me when I'm gone, besides I'm really missing human food!"

Ariel and Aquatta shared a laugh, then said their farewells. Ariel was still feeling thoroughly overfed from her gorging at the feast, but she swam to each of her friends, and her father, before she made her way from her father's underwater kingdom back to the world above.

A strange thought came into Eric's head as he pondered over a solution to Ariel's dilemma, and as the words left his mouth, he couldn't help but be surprised that he even said it: "Why not just go naked?" The prince blushed and hurriedly clamped his hands over his mouth, absolutely dreading Ariel's reaction. 'No, no, no!' he thought. 'Why did I let such an insane suggestion slip like that?!'

To his infinite surprise, though, it appeared as though his pudgy lover was not utterly outraged at his idea, as he had been expecting. Rather, she had placed one hand on her flabby chin and appeared deep in thought. While her old, skinny self would have most definitely balked at the prospect of giving up on clothes and exhibiting her body everywhere, the last few weeks of nude stuffing and fattening had had quite an effect on her judgment. Something about all the time she'd spent without clothes, enjoying the feeling of her fat body growing as she ate everything she wanted, coupled with Eric's newfound love and appreciation for her form, had caused a change in the former mermaid. She now felt somehow...confident about her new self. It would be a somewhat rough transition, for sure, but as long as she had her food and Eric's support to fall back on, she might just make it...

When Ariel was finally able to muster her response, the already surprised Eric was even more taken aback by what it was: "Well..." stammered Ariel, touching the tips of her thick little fingers together nervously, "Yes-- I'll do it. Or, I mean...I'll try, at least...I might wanna ease into things before actually going out in public naked, but all your encouragement over these past few weeks makes me want to give it a shot. If not for me, then for you!" She finished off her answer with a smile, posing with her arms held together in such a way as to show off her generous cleavage.

To say that Eric was ecstatic would have been an understatement...and over the next few weeks, he delivered on his promise, supporting his beloved wife all the way as she gradually grew accustomed to life without clothes. She started small, venturing further away from her designated quarters and allowing the various servants to see her exposed form; their responses were about what one would expect, but Eric quickly dissuaded them with a hurried explanation. They were no less confused, but preferred not to question their lord's orders. All the while, the young princess continued to gorge herself on every bit of scrumptious food she could get her hands on, growing bigger and flabbier with each feast. Her already huge belly bloated out nearly two feet in front of her, and sagged down past even her knees, while her enormous breasts grew larger as well, resting heavily atop her shelf of belly rolls. What was once the beginnings of a double chin on her face now amounted to nearly three, and a set of even chubbier cheeks contributed to a pleasingly round visage. And last but not least, her butt had reached such a size as to lift her up off of any surface she sat on.

Ariel's continued growth, surprisingly, had only increased her confidence; she was now even beginning to contemplate leaving the castle entirely and showing her new self to the world! "Why hide such a beautiful body," she thought; Eric certainly seemed more than happy with it. And she would only get bigger and more beautiful the more she ate...by now, any thoughts of clothes had essentially vanished from her mind. Of course, by this point, not even her biggest dress or skimpiest bikini would fit her, a fact that she actually took a measure of pride in...

Being all alone in her tower except for Pascal, Rapunzel never had to think much about her looks. She was very fond of cooking pastries, which was a delicious way to spend her lonely time. Pascal shrugged : he wasn't very aware of human's standards of beauty. All he knew that Rapunzel looked good and she always would to him.

Standing in front of her mirror, Rapunzel examined herself. She wasn't fat at all, no, but Mother Gothel was right : she was getting kind of chubby. Her hips, once perfectly slender, were wider, giving her a more womanly look. Her thighs were also fuller, the inner part now filled with soft flab, rubbing a bit when she walked. Finally, her stomach had grown into a rounded little belly. She could resist and poked it : it felt so warm and soft!!

*sigh* "I'm getting chubby, Mother is right... How could I ever go outside looking like this??"

Soon enough, she had a crazy idea that might actually work : she rolled her hair all over her plumper body and began singing.

"Flower, gleam and glow
Let your power shine
Make the clock reverse
Bring back what once was mine

Heal what has been hurt
Change the Fates' design
Save what has been lost
Bring back what once was mine

What once was mine"

Much to her disbelief, as she removed her hair, she noticed that her body was back to its perfect form again!!

"Wow, that's amazing!! I might actually be able to go outside to watch the flying lanterns after all!!" she exclaimed in happiness.

15333112.content:
Keeping Rapunzel locked away had been hard ever since she was a young girl. Naturally curious and inquisitive about the world outside the towel, a day didn't go by where Rapunzel pleaded with her mother to let her outside. Mother Gothel tried fobbing her off with gentle lies and excuses as to why she couldn't leave, but soon the constant requests began to grate on her nerves. She couldn't even trust Rapunzel to be left on her own anymore, she had the nagging feeling that one day her curiosity would lead her to the point of disobeying her own mother. Mother Gothel was at her wits end, she couldn't risk her precious little flower escaping from her, but she had to make sure that Rapunzel couldn't leave the tower.

A wicked smile crossed her painted lips, and she bought her fingers up underneath her chin. The only way out of the tower was through narrow windows and doorways, it had been built long ago when people were generally much thinner. Mother Gothel stood up from her armchair, taking slow, deliberate steps across the stone floor. If Rapunzel was too big to fit through those exits, then it meant that she would be unable to physically leave the tower. She threw back her head as she laughed, quietly as Rapunzel was still sleeping upstairs. It was simple. She would just have to fatten Rapunzel up.

With that, Mother Gothel started to use her magic. She baked pies, sweet cakes, trifles and pastries, all of the sweet, fattening things she knew the young Princess loved. She made each treat as delicious as she could make it, with a slight addictive nature to the taste, so that poor Rapunzel would continue to eat no matter how full she felt. Mother Gothel sang to herself as she worked, soon the kitchen table was groaning with the weight of the treats she had made, and even more lined the counters of the room. The sun had began to rise when she was finally finished, and almost predictably, she heard Rapunzel's feet on the staircase.

The pretty blond teenage appeared with sleepy eyes, she rubbed at them on seeing all of the food on display, seeming to wake up a little. "Mother?" she asked as she looked around in surprise, "What's going on? I thought you said I should cut down on treats because they made me chubby." Mother Gothel let out one of her tinkling laughs, and she shoved her adopted daughter into a chair, pushing her in tightly to the table.

"Oh perish the thought," Mother Gothel insisted, resting her hand over her heart, "You're far too thin, Rapunzel. You don't need to worry about what you eat with that trim waistline of yours." Rapunzel seemed confused, but she reached out for one of the jam tarts all the same, taking a small nibble of it. Mother Gothel watched closely as the magic took hold, and Rapunzel began to eat with a little more fervour, as if she had been starved for weeks, rather than just one night. Soon the tart turned into two, three, and soon Rapunzel had cleared the plate completely. Crumbs were scattered against her dress as she reached for one of the cakes, starting to eat hungrily. Mother Gothel could only watch in amazement, and soon her gaze dropped to Rapunzel's previously flat stomach.

It was starting to push out into the slightest of bulges from the food that was being packed into it. Mother Gothel smirked slightly, and murmured an incantation under her breath that would allow Rapunzel's clothes to grow with her, so that she wouldn't know any different. With that Rapunzel continued to eat, making quite the dent in the food on the table.
